entry.title: Session #0 prep
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I will be updating this page with resouces for Session #0.

Software

Ideally, I would like to use a mix of Tabletop Simulator for a virtual tabletop and dndbeyond to manage character sheets. You may use whatever tools you best see fit, but I wanted to provide these two since these are the two I will be using.

Tabletop Simulator mod pack

To increase load times in Tabletop Simulator, I suggest grabbing the mods below. These are the mods that I will be using on the table, so having them downloaded locally will help to prevent you from needing them to be downlaoded upon connecting.

This still needs to be aggregated
entry.summary: Hello everyone! I will be updating this page with resouces for Session #0.
